overview: For these couples, sex is worth it only if it’s shared. Whether with another man or another woman, they can’t conceive making love to only one partner at a time. The only rule is that the husband can watch his wife taking pleasure with someone else.  Adriana Chechik, a pretty hot American woman with a very high libido is married to a man who loves to watch her fuck other men. This spices up their already busy sex life. Adrian is a young woman any man would like to have: pretty eyes, pretty smile, a body to die for and an immoderate taste for sex. What more could you ask for? The couple’s sex games have no limits. Today, Adriana’s husband drove her to the doors of a luxurious villa.
tagline: Sex is good only if it’s shared
title: Luxure: Borrow My Wife
